entry.title: Bitcoin-Qt/bitcoind version 0.8.3 released
entry.summary: In an email conversation on June 26th, 2013 at 01:13:25 AM, Jesus Cea pointed out that the "splash" banner of a certain release showed "0.8.3-BETA". Pieter responded by stating that this is nothing unusual and follows the trend of every other release until they reach version 1.0. No further context or information is provided in the exchange.
